item.title: HTTP -- this thing what you think is ReST
item.description: Intro Link to heading I often read in applications that the candidates know ReST. When they are asked what the quintessence of ReST is and how it differs from HTTP, i rarely get a satisfactory answer. Therefore, let’s first have a look at HTTP a.k.a. what most developers understand by a ReST API. Idea Link to heading The base idea behind HTTP is that we use the magic that the web provides us with free of charge.
